title: A nomogram incorporating Psoas muscle index for predicting tumor recurrence after liver transplantation: A retrospective study in an Eastern Asian population
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Bo Yang, Guobin Huang, Dong Chen, Lai Wei, Yuanyuan Zhao, Gen Chen, Junbo Li, Lu Wang, Bowen Xie, Wei Jiang, Zhishui Chen
